featuredArticle.title: Federal Reserve Cuts Interest Rates by 0.5% in Surprise December Decision
featuredArticle.excerpt: The Federal Reserve has cut interest rates by 50 basis points in an unexpected move, citing cooling inflation and strong employment data. Markets rallied on the news, with the S&P 500 reaching new all-time highs.
